title: Gorgeous 1 bed with fully updated appliance!! not available for long!!
posting_body: Hitting a new note of desirability amongst a buzzing Chicago scene, primed to carry on a conversation of elevated Windy City living.
Channeling a modern muse, these studio, one, and two-bedroom apartment homes trend toward an unmatched level of refinement.
It welcomes the artistic nature of its Gold Coast neighborhood inside – placing delicate attention to every detail.
Greet guests in the trend-setting lobby.
Appreciate an unrivaled experience of the Chicago skyline from the rooftop lounge and event space.
Simply put, this is an opportunity to pursue.
It’s a chic canvas for those that seek a modern lifestyle, without venturing outside the character Chicago presents.
This concept flows through each immaculately redesigned apartment home, which offers residents sleek fixtures and sophisticated finishes.
Whether it’s access to high-end retailers or a menu of foodie craved dining options, a metropolitan edge mixes and mingles with the renowned Gold Coast neighborhood this community calls home.
Open the doors to a new era of luxury living.
A Sophisticated Collection of Features
It’s easy to pass by apartment communities that are designed merely as a place to rest your head.
Instead, take our advice and seek out an experience that sets its sights higher to elevate your entire lifestyle.
Maybe you like having the ability to walk to work.
Or, maybe you appreciate the activity breezing through your own Windy City escape.
Just like that dream job or special significant other,
Roll out the red carpet for your guests by strolling through the showstopping outdoor space.
Designed to bring an outdoor oasis to the Chicago metropolitan scape, the area features a pool, sprawling sun deck, and lush dog park.
All these features expertly align with the immaculate design aesthetic on display throughout the community.
A state-of-the-art fitness facility is also available and will exceed even the expectations of fitness fanatics.
Here you’ll have access to high-end equipment and an expansive private yoga space.
Eager to see these highlighting features?
Plan your first trip to this exclusive Chicago address by scheduling a tour.
After all, your life is on the up-and-up, your residence should be as well.
Features: Dishwasher, Microwave, Quartz Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, Walk-In Closet
